document_data.name: Ulbrinter
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulbrinter''' ({{Pronounce|UL|BRIN|ter|primary stress=2|refs=}}) was a noble house of [[Waterdeep]]. Their trade and interests included shipping and shipwrights.
document_data.Base of Operations: Their estate within the city of [[Waterdeep]], [[Ulbrinter Villa]], housed 24 guards and six servants
document_data.Members:
*[[Nomus Ulbrinter]]
*Lady [[Karya]] - wife of Nomus{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|7}}
*Lady [[Patrisa]] - heiress of Ulbrinter and daughter of Nomus and Karya{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|7}}
*Lady [[Remallia Haventree]] - wife of Arthagast
* [[Arthagast Ulbrinter]] - husband of Remallia
* [[Arthius]] - half-elf son of Remallia and Arthagast
* [[Serenore]] - half-elf daughter of Remallia and Arthagast
